title: Have the Germans really shown remorse over World War Two? - Quora

response.answer_text: I had been binge-reading WW2 books and the more I read the more upset I was at the Germans. How dare they decide who deserves to live and who doesn't! All that based on the color of the hair and skin? They got away easy after instigating two world wars. To claim that it was just a handful of people who caused this mayhem is disingenuous.  The Germans should be paying reparations to this day.
Most Germans that live today were born after WW2. If we apologize, it necessarily is on behalf on someone else i guess.
